reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-fitting with sleeves and length that are perfect, and appreciate its quality, with one noting it feels more expensive than its price. The style features a unique pattern, and customers describe it as soft and luxurious, with a nice weight that's particularly suitable for colder days. They like the color, with one mentioning it looks more expensive than its price, and find it comfortabl

items.body: I was a but worried, mostly because I went down a size. But fits liked it was made for me! I chose green and it matches my skin and hair so nicely. I want to get more but i don't want all my sweaters to have stripes on sleeves, neck and bottom. ðŸ˜ I totally recommend this sweater. It feels so wonderful on and comfy. I'm going to check other sweaters from this brand. Read more
items.author: Peg

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and good weight
items.body: This is very nice, true to size, nice feel to the material and length. Also a good weight. Green's can be funny but I did finally find leggings that went perfectly with it the colorfulkoala in Army green also on Amazon. Not only were they a very good match but they were nice leggings. Me for the win! Read more
items.author: MotownGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, heavy and beautiful seeater
items.body: Beautiful, heavy/thick, soft sweater. A little over-sized. I have not washed or worn yet, so I can't speak to the overall quality (regarding pilling, etc). I am pleasantly surprised at how nice it is. Read more
items.author: Sharon B.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and design
items.body: I do really like this sweater. Itâ€™s the sizing that I wish were a little different but thatâ€™s likely a â€œmeâ€ issue. The medium is more oversized than Iâ€™d like and the small Iâ€™m worried how it would hold up. But itâ€™s soft, cute for work or casual. Itâ€™s not stiff at all and didnâ€™t wrinkle as I wore it throughout the day. Really cute stitching too! I my sizing comment still leaves me liking it enough to give it 4 stars. Buy it Read more
items.author: Liz Winn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Beautiful color,great feel and fit. Perfect for the cold weather do to it being thick. Love it for Oct. And Nov Read more
items.author: Dawn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Avoid pastel â€œfloralâ€ colors for this item.
items.body: I returned the sweater due to appearance. The pink color (top layer) would have been cute and fit was fine. The contrasting floral pattern was achieved by a solid black fabric layer underneath the pink. So most areas of the sweater were a â€œdirtyâ€ pink/dark grey and border areas were the cute pink. If you zoom in on the picture you can see the issue. I would not recommend buying in a light color. Might be okay for some other color combos. Read more
items.author: GMa0616

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and reasonably Priced
items.body: This sweater is Amazing. It's a nice material,nice and warm, does not wrinkle, its not cheap feeling either, looks amazing. In my opinion it does run big do I had to order a size down. I am 5'8 200lbs and I was swimming in an XL. Had to order a Large. Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweather.
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater..Fit is perfect, design very stylish. The fabric is great.. I ordered another one in a different color.. You can dress it up or down.. perfectâ€¦thank you. Read more
items.author: Linda

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nutmeg, Pink Floral, Rust, Black Floral, Blue, Elk Pattern, White Stripe, Pumpkin, Army Green, Black, White Floral, Apricot Black Stripe, Rose Red, Wine Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
